content.rendered:
Checked baggage

Maximum weight  : 23 kg.

Dimensions:158 cm (height+width+length)

Pieces over 32 kg. are not admitted.

 

For more details visit : http://www.air nostrum.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Nostrum Excess Baggage

Air Nostrum Hand | Cabin  Baggage
